definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: (pressed) raisin-cake—´[[א]] 2Sa 6:19, 1Ch 16:3 distributed, with other viands, to people; esp. as stimulating, pl. [[אֲשִׁישׁוֹת]] Ct So 2:5; more explicitly [[אֲשִׁישֵׁי עֲנׇבִים]] Ho 3:1 used in sacrificial feasts (cf. RS:OTJC Lect. xi. n. 7); [[אֲשִׁישֵׁי]] [[קִיר חֲרֶשֶׂת]] Is 16:7, i.e. the raisin-cakes which were an article of trade at Qir-ḥareseth (taken by Thes al. = foundations, i.e. foundations exposed by ruin, from [[[אָשִׁישׁ]]] with such a meaning).
